name: Samuel
headerTaglineThree: Web development and Machine Learning enthusiast

projects.title: Water Depth Estimation using DNN
projects.description: Effectively conducted the research and implementation of an advanced algorithm, integrating SVMs and Deep Neural Networks to estimate shallow water depths from Sentinel-2 Satellite image bands achieving more than 90% accuracy

projects.title: Connect 4
projects.description: Its a connect 4 game with a twist,instead of making horizontal ,vertical or diagonal lines of four our objective here is to make sqaures.

projects.title: Angular Page with bootstrap form
projects.description: Created a Page with Angular and Bootstrap to fill in a survey page with form validations and hosted on Amazon S3

projects.title: MNIST GAN
projects.description: Developing a GAN for generating images requires both a discriminator convolutional neural network model for classifying whether a given image is real or generated and a generator model that uses inverse convolutional layers to transform an input to a full two-dimensional image of pixel values.

projects.title: Image Colorisation
projects.description: Colorize black and white images or videos using the image colorizer. Add color to old family photos and historic images, or bring an old film back to life with colorization.

projects.title: Simuualed Annealing
projects.description: Simulated annealing is a method for solving unconstrained and bound-constrained optimization problems

aboutpara: I am an ambitious graduate student at George Mason University, driven by a profound passion for deep learning, competitive coding, and web development. With a dedicated and analytical approach, I strive to solve problems and explore new possibilities with a curious mindset. I possess exceptional proficiency in the programming languages of Python and C++, utilizing them effectively in my pursuits
